replies.body:
How about having skill based icons instead of just open your wallet for us ?
I dont care about paying others might but have something that people will fear when they see the icon. Not just ohh he spent $5

Riot provides a relatively high quality, FREE TO PLAY game and deserves to create things to ear them a little cash some times.

If you want icons that denote "skill" or time spent playing you already have the icons you get for the event playlists + End of year + the ones you get for playing a character class frequently in team builder; let them make a little profit without complaining about it.
Not to forget the icons you get for your ranked tier at the end of the season
and a few trillion $$ later
You mean, like, the thing they already did ages ago with champion mastery banners?
Dude, Spatula does represent skill, it says that your gonna crush your opponent, then scrape them of the ground with your battle hardened, golden spatula... that i was rather quite after.
What is this Rioto? No Gromp? {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}} You disappoint me.
There's already a gromp one :P
Are there blue buff/red buff ones though?
there's already a gromp icon
Guessing there's no bundle? It's okay... {{champion:32}}
I think it might be portrayed as the smaller ones as the feathers around their neck are red
So when are Red and Blue buff getting icons? Double-buff bundle?
So now we are just missing Brambleback & Sentinel? Unless i'm forgetting.

No Icon for Red or Blue?

K
Skuttle <33333333
Why no gromp???
there already is
be very scared of that river monster that gives you a free ward, if u attack him with low health and no smite it will kill you...
ikr totally

Serious riot we dont have too give you money to get some icon that you are going to replace with a better one. Don't make us fork out money for a picture of a crap when i can just stick on to my screen
riot has done a goo job on the game and if riot received no money you wouldn't be playing this game anymore due to the fact that it costs a lot to support such a big game
They should make summoner icons IP :(
Why cant make this cost ip?
time to make minion icons
